gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 114, Hawks 102
gameRecap.excerpt: Brooklyn defeats Atlanta, 114-102. For Brooklyn, Mikal Bridges led the way with 38 points (five 3PM), five rebounds, and two steals aided by Cameron Johnson (23 points, 5 rebounds) and Nic Claxton (12 points, 13 rebounds, two blocks) in the victory. Dejounte Murray led the way with 20 points, six rebounds, and 11 assists with Saddiq Bey tallying 23 points for Atlanta in the losing effort. Brooklyn wins and improves to 24-36 on the season, while Atlanta moves to 26-34 with the loss.
